item.title: Carambola Board arrived

item.description: Yay the Carambola Board arrived today from Exp Tech. Time to start hacking!! Good place to start with: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NK0ia4DXrtA[/youtube] To start with: http://www.8devices.com/wiki_carambola/doku.php/
item.content:encoded:
Yay the Carambola Board arrived today from Exp Tech. Time to start hacking!!
